title: fc705154.AzAdSG.001
frontText: Which storage redundancy should you choose if you would like to have the copies distributed across the availability zones of the primary region and have read‐only secondary copies for cross‐region redundancy?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.002
frontText: What is the first step in configuring Azure File Sync?
backText: Installation of file sync servers on the Windows Server

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.003
frontText: If you have a storage account with the name “axdf01,” what would be the endpoint for table storage?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.004
frontText: Which service is used to store an Azure VM backup taken by Azure Backup?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.005
frontText: Which service should be used to decide if the user should be granted access or denied access based on the location of the user?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.006
frontText: Which license is required to use the Identity Protection feature of Azure AD?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.007
frontText: For a custom image, ______________ virtual machines can be created in a virtual machine scale set.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.008
frontText: Azure Container Service is a ______________ solution.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.009
frontText: Which feature of App Service should be used to create staging, QA, and production instances of the same application?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.010
frontText: Out of all Azure App Service tiers, the manual scaling option is available from the ____ tier onward.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.011
frontText: Which command‐line tools should be used to manage an Azure Kubernetes cluster?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.012
frontText: ______________ can be used to store container images.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.013
frontText: _____________________ is used to build container images to the Azure Container Registry.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.014
frontText: You plan to include automation as part of your virtual machine deployment. Which extension should be used to make sure that the automation is not interrupted by the reboot?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.015
frontText: The _______________ feature can be used to help users to reset their own passwords without reaching out to the help desk.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.016
frontText: The ____________________ role should be given to a user to manage all resources and to delegate access.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.017
frontText: The ________________ lock avoids accidental deletion of Azure resources.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.018
frontText: ____________________ can be used to logically group subscriptions and then apply roles and policies.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.019
frontText: Azure tags are _____________ pairs.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.020
frontText: True/False: General Purpose v1 storage accounts support GZRS.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.021
frontText: Costs in Azure can be managed using _________________________.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.022
frontText: Which tools offer a GUI experience to work with Azure storage account management?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.023
frontText: True/False: AzCopy can be used to move files from Azure Files to Azure Blob Storage.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.024
frontText: True/False: Azure Files can be authenticated using Azure AD.
backText: False: Azure Files doesn’t support Azure AD at the time of writing this book.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.025
frontText: The __________________ section in an ARM template consists of user‐configurable values that will be used during template execution.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.026
frontText: If we have a variable name, how is it referenced in the ARM template?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.027
frontText: Which properties of parameters can be used to specify the minimum and maximum length of a string?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.028
frontText: A ____________________ image can be taken to create custom images of virtual machines ideal for using virtual machine scale sets.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.029
frontText: What factor decides the number of data disks that can be added to a VM?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.030
frontText: ______________________ comprise fault domains and update domains.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.031
frontText: The ___________________________ service is used to automatically increase or decrease the number of virtual machines based on demand.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.032
frontText: The pods in AKS can be scaled using _____________________.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.033
frontText: The process of moving all running pods from a node to a different node for upgrade purposes is called ____________________.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.034
frontText: The autoscaling option is available from the ____________ tier of Azure App Service.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.035
frontText: True/False: Azure App Service with a TLS‐enabled MySQL database can be backed up using Azure App Service Backup option.
backText: False: TLS‐enabled databases are not supported as of now.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.036
frontText: Which is the default networking model while creating an AKS cluster?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.037
frontText: If every pod needs to get an IP address from the subnet, then you should use the __________ networking model.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.038
frontText: True/False: We can buy domains from Azure App Service and use it for our web applications.
backText: True: Using App Service domains, we will be able to purchase domains and use them as custom domains with App Service.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.039
frontText: _____________________ routes are responsible for enabling communication between the resources deployed in the same virtual network.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.040
frontText: __________________ can be used to optimize Azure storage cost by transitioning access tiers according to the last modified date.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.041
frontText: Which are the protocols used by Azure Files?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.042
frontText: With the help of _____________ and _________________, we can set minimum and maximum values of integer parameters in ARM template.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.043
frontText: Which keyword in Kusto Query Language can be used to create charts?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.044
frontText: If you would like to make sure the users are able to deploy Cosmos DB in East US only, which service should you use?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.045
frontText: A maximum of _____ tag name‐value pairs can be added to an Azure resource.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.046
frontText: The tag name is limited to_____ characters, and the tag value is limited to _____ characters.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.047
frontText: True/False: The tag name is limited to 512 characters, and the tag value is limited to 256 characters. For storage accounts, the tag name is limited to 128 characters, and the tag value is limited to 256 characters.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.048
frontText: Is the backup cost included in the VM cost?
backText: No. Backup costs are separate from a VM’s costs.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.049
frontText: The Azure Virtual Machine backup policy supports a minimum retention range from ____ days up to ____ days.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.050
frontText: True/False: We can take an on‐demand (ad hoc) backup without scheduling a backup for an Azure VM.
backText: False: You can’t trigger on‐demand backups by disabling scheduled backups.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.051
frontText: True/False: Azure Monitor cannot monitor on‐premises resources.
backText: False: Azure Monitor can collect data from Azure, on‐premises, and other cloud providers.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.052
frontText: An _______________ is a collection of notification and action preferences that can be used when an alert is fired.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.053
frontText: Which tool can be used to connect on‐premises Active Directory to Azure AD?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.054
frontText: True/False: We can perform bulk add/delete operations on Azure AD users.
backText: True: We can perform bulk import, export, and deletion of users in Azure AD.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.055
frontText: True/False: Azure custom RBAC roles can be created only using Azure PowerShell and the CLI.
backText: False: Azure custom RBAC roles can be created from the Azure portal, Azure PowerShell, and the CLI.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.056
frontText: True/False: A resource group deployed in West US can have resources from other regions like East US or Central US.
backText: True: We can have resources that are deployed in multiple regions in a single resource group.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.057
frontText: Which load balancing solution should you use if you want to load balance between virtual machines running database service?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.058
frontText: Which PaaS solution can be used to connect to Azure Virtual Machines from the Azure portal without the need for public IP addresses?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.059
frontText: What is the name of the firewall that can be used with Azure Application Gateway to protect web applications?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.060
frontText: __________________ is a DNS‐based traffic load balancer.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.061
frontText: Which is the default load balancing algorithm in Azure Load Balancer?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.062
frontText: True/False: Application Gateway can be used with protocols such as SMTP, IMAP, and POP3.
backText: False: Azure Application Gateway supports only the HTTP/HTTPS protocols.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.063
frontText: Which SKU of Application Gateway supports autoscaling?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.064
frontText: True/False: Application Gateway requires a dedicated subnet.
backText: True: Application Gateway is always deployed in a dedicated subnet in the virtual network.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.065
frontText: Let’s say for a virtual machine, you have NSGs applied to both subnet and NIC. For inbound traffic, which NSG will evaluate the traffic first?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.066
frontText: In an NSG, if you have rules with priority 110 and 112, which one takes precedence?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.067
frontText: What type of connection will be used by remote developers to connect to Azure virtual network using VPN?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.068
frontText: True/False: When we create Azure Firewall, only the traffic allowed by NSGs will be routed to the resources.
backText: False: By default, Azure Firewall blocks all traffic.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.069
frontText: Which service should you use if you would like to get a private IP address from a virtual network for your storage account?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.070
frontText: True/False: If auto‐registration is enabled, there is no need to link the virtual network to the private Azure DNS zone for registering VM DNS records.
backText: False: You need to link virtual network regardless of autoregistration is enabled or not.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.071
frontText: True/False: Azure VNet Peering has bandwidth restrictions and uses the Internet to transmit data.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.072
frontText: The PPP NCP protocols provide what feature?
backText: Identification of the various Network layer protocols

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.073
frontText: True/False: Application Gateway Standard v2 SKU supports autoscaling
backText: True: Autoscaling is supported for Standard v2.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.074
frontText: True/False: Azure Application Gateway is a layer 4 load balancer.
backText: False: Application Gateway is a layer 7 load balancer.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.075
frontText: _________________ are numerical values used to represent the state of a resource in near real time.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.076
frontText: ____________________ can be used to move resources across regions, resource groups, and subscriptions.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.077
frontText: True/False: VMs behind the load balancer require a NAT gateway for outbound connections.
backText: True: The NAT gateway is required for outbound connections from the backend pool.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.078
frontText: Which feature of Azure AD can be leveraged to enable additional levels of authentication including call to phone, text to phone, and using the authenticator app?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.079
frontText: What determines the number of data disks that can be added to a virtual machine?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.080
frontText: True/False: OS disks cannot be resized.
backText: False: OS disks can be resized.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.081
frontText: True/False: By default, all administrators will have self‐service password reset enabled.
backText: True: Admins will have SSPR enabled by default.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.082
frontText: ______________________ can be used to chain policies and apply them together to a scope.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.083
frontText: ________________ can be used to avoid accidental deletion or modification of Azure resources.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.084
frontText: True/False: While using the Import/Export service, Microsoft will send disks to the end customer to copy data from and to the cloud.
backText: False: The customer needs to bring their own disks to use Import/Export service.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.085
frontText: True/False: Azure Files is not supported for Linux.
backText: False: Azure Files can be mounted to Windows, Linux, and macOS.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.086
frontText: The _____________________ tier provides the lowest storage access cost.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.087
frontText: The _______________________ command in PowerShell can be used to export a template of all resources in a resource group.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.088
frontText: ____________________ can be used to assign department and cost center details to a VM.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.089
frontText: Which storage redundancy should you use to store data across multiple availability zones?

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.090
frontText: ARM templates are written in ____________ format.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.091
frontText: The ________________________ tool in Network Watcher can be used to verify VPN connectivity and health.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.092
frontText: Packet capture taken using Network Watcher can be stored in local VM storage, __________________, or ____________

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.093
frontText: ______________________ are mainly text that comprise information relevant to the operation of the system.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.094
frontText: The _____________________ event category in Activity Logs stores alerts generated by Microsoft Defender for the cloud.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.095
frontText: True/False: Action group actions supports Service Bus.
backText: False: Supported actions are Automation Runbook, Azure Functions, Azure Logic Apps, ITSM, Webhook, and Event Hub.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.096
frontText: ____________________________ is an environment that will be used for the ingestion of Azure Monitor logs.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.097
frontText: The _____________________ operator in KQL can be used to aggregate the response.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.098
frontText: NSG flows will be stored in __________________ format.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.099
frontText: Setting the access level of blob storage containers to public will enable ______________ access.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.100
frontText: The ________________ storage service is appropriate for storing a list of messages that needs to be asynchronously processed.

title: fc705154.AzAdSG.101
frontText: Azure Table is an example of a __________________ datastore.
